snippet: FIFA’s president, Sepp Blatter, said Brazil would be seen as the wrong choice as host of the 2014 World Cup if the tournament was affected by social protests.
abstract: FIFA president Sepp Blatter warns that Brazil will be seen as the wrong choice as host of the 2014 World Cup if the tournament is affected by social protests similar to those at the Confederations Cup.
lead_paragraph: FIFA’s president, Sepp Blatter, said Brazil would be seen as the wrong choice as host of the 2014 World Cup if the tournament was affected by social protests.

headline.main: With Concern Over Protests, Blatter Warns Brazil
